name: Colors! (Nel549)
description:
Colors! is a casual game where you have a ball that has a random color and must match with obstacles with other colors. If you peer the color you can go further in the game, if not then you die :(

Try to get more and more points so you can buy an icon for your ball from the shop which has 19 items!

Share the game with your friends so you can challenge each other and concur over who's high score is greater!

HOW TO PLAY:
-Drag the ball with your mouse anywhere on the screen but not to the wrong color ;)

WHY COLORS!:
-Fun and addicting
-Time waster
-Boredom killer
-Simple and easy to play
-Chilling background music

Thanks for downloading my game and have fun!
